alert.note: Alert for Lanai Leeward (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 21 at 5:02PM HST until January 23 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH EARLY MONDAY MORNING FOR THE NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND FOR THE NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... ...HIGH SURF WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH EARLY MONDAY MORNING FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF THE BIG ISLAND... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH EARLY MONDAY MORNING FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF LANAI... .An extra large northwest (300-320 degree) swell will rapidly build tonight through Sunday and will produce extremely dangerous surf. Waves could overtop lower roadways especially during the early morning high tides along north and west facing shorelines. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SUNDAY TO 6 AM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 8 to 12 feet along west facing shores. * WHERE...Lanai Leeward. * WHEN...From 6 AM Sunday to 6 AM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
